#!/bin/ash
# Pterodactyl Discord Bot Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apk add --no-cache --update git

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "pulling the Pterodactyl Discord Bot from github"

git clone --single-branch --branch master https://github.com/Sam1370/pis-bot.git .

echo "Install complete. If you watched this. Congrats."
